member.name: T:Sudoku.Drawing.ISudokuPainter
member.summary: Defines a sudoku painter instance.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Drawing.ISudokuPainter.GridImageGenerator
member.summary: The grid image generator.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Drawing.ISudokuPainter.SaveTo(System.String)
member.summary: Render the image with the current configuration, and save the image to the local path, and automatically release the memory while rendering and image creating.
member.exception: Throws when the specified file format specified in the argument is .
Throws when the specified file format specified in the argument is not supported.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Drawing.ISudokuPainter.TrySaveTo(System.String)
member.summary: Render the image with the current configuration, and save the image to the local path, and automatically release the memory while rendering and image creating.
member.returns:
A result indicating whether the file is successfully saved or not. All supported formats are:
*.jpg and *.jpeg
*.png
*.bmp
*.gif
*.wmf
Other formats are not supported. This method will return for not being supported.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Drawing.ISudokuPainter.Render
member.summary: Render the image with the current configuration.

para.b: Please note that the method will return an type, you should release it after used. The recommend pattern is using statement:
para.code: using var image = Render(); // Then you can do something you want to do ...

member.name: M:Sudoku.Drawing.ISudokuPainterFactory.WithFontScale(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Sets a font scale that is used for rendering text of digits (values and candidates) in a sudoku grid.

param.name: fontScale
param.para: We recommend you assign the value with the range (0, 1], with the boundary value 1, but not containing 0.

member.summary: The square root of 2.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Drawing.ProjectWideConstants.RotateAngle
member.summary: The rotate angle (45 degrees). This field is used for rotate the chains if some of them are overlapped.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Drawing.ProjectWideConstants.DefaultOffset
member.summary: Indicates the default offset value.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Drawing.ProjectWideConstants.AnchorsCount
member.summary: Indicates the number of anchors hold per house.
member.remarks: The sudoku grid painter will draw the outlines and the inner lines, and correct the point of each digits (candidates also included). Each row or column always contains 27 candidates, so this value is 27.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.GraphicsExtensions.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit)
member.summary: Draws an image onto the target instance, with specified customized data.
member.param: The image to be used for drawing onto the target instance.
The X coordinate of the destination point.
The Y coordinate of the destination point.
The width of the destination point.
The height of the destination point.
The X coordinate of the source point.
The Y coordinate of the source point.
The width of the source point.
The height of the source point.
The source graphics unit instance indicating which kind of unit those coordinate arguments (e.g. , , , , etc.) uses.

member.summary: Draw the string representation an instance onto the current instance.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to draw.

member.summary: Draw the string representation of an instance onto the current instance.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to draw.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.GraphicsExtensions.DrawCrossSign(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Pen,System.Drawing.RectangleF@)
member.summary: Draw a cross sign (x).
member.remarks: This method will draw a cross sign and fill with the specified color, so you don't need to find any fill methods.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.RectangleExtensions.Zoom(System.Drawing.Rectangle@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Zoom in or out the rectangle by the specified offset. If the offset is positive, the rectangle will be larger; otherwise, smaller.
member.param: The offset to zoom in or out.

member.param: The offset to zoom in or out.
